name: Digi-Key Electronics
description: Leading global electronic component distributor. Specializes in semiconductors, passives, connectors, and electromechanical components. Fast shipping with extensive inventory.

name: Mouser Electronics
description: Global authorized distributor of semiconductors and electronic components. Wide selection of development tools and embedded solutions.

name: Arrow Electronics
description: Global provider of products, services, and solutions to industrial and commercial users of electronic components and enterprise computing solutions.

name: Newark Electronics
description: High-service distributor of technology products, services and solutions for electronic system design, maintenance and repair.

name: RS Components
description: Global distributor of electronic, electrical and industrial components. Strong in automation, control and MRO products.

name: Future Electronics
description: Global leading distributor of electronic components. Strong relationships with major semiconductor manufacturers.

name: TTI Inc
description: Specialty distributor of passive, connector, electromechanical and discrete components. Focus on authorized distribution.

name: Avnet
description: Global technology solutions company and one of the largest distributors of electronic components and embedded solutions.

name: TE Connectivity
description: Global industrial technology leader creating a safer, sustainable, productive, and connected future. Specializes in connectors, sensors, and antennas.
